backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining portfolio types, admin authentication, stable state, and CRUD logic with storage and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that maps old actor state to new actor state while dropping deprecated authorization fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a specific admin-login error-handling feature to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference during build or analysis.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting metadata, social preview tags, and loading the React entry script.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots config allowing all crawlers except for admin routes and pointing to the sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing all public site URLs with change frequency and priority.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring all public and admin routes with layout components and initialization hooks.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when a user lacks admin access, with message and link back to home.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminEmailL: Email/password admin login form handling authentication, errors, and redirecting to intended admin paths.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button that triggers Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/controls/DarkMod: Theme toggle button switching between light and dark modes using next-themes.
Typing animation component cycling through words with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Admin panel layout handling auth gating, intended path logic, navigation, and logout.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing copyright, branding, and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Public site layout including navbar, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicNav: Responsive public navigation bar with links, dark mode toggle, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Project card showing image, description, tech badges, and links to live demo or GitHub.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor based on identity and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminGuard.ts: Simple admin guard exposing authentication and loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminMutations.ts: Provides React Query mutations for creating, updating, and deleting admin-managed data with session-aware error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminQueries.ts: Defines queries for fetching admin contact messages and the caller’s user profile using the current actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session tokens, validation, login, and logout with shared state and React Query integration.
Handles contact form submission via a mutation and updates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInitializeSeed.ts: Runs initial seed logic for admin users and invalidates queries after seeding completes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolioQueries.t: Provides portfolio-related queries for fetching about info, skills, projects, experiences, social links, and files.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with component utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstrap file that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page using portfolio data and avatar files with loading skeletons and layout styling.
Admin page to edit and save About page content using fetch and update mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAvatarPage: Admin interface for viewing and uploading an avatar with file validation, preview, and upload progress.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders an admin dashboard grid linking to various management sections with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminExperience: Provides CRUD UI for managing work experience entries using dialogs and form inputs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMessagesPa: Displays, sorts, marks as read, and deletes contact messages with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProjectsPa: Offers interfaces to create, edit, and delete projects with technology lists and image URLs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminResumePage: Manages resume upload, validation, progress tracking, and downloading of the current resume.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSkillsPage: Allows creating, editing, and deleting skills with category and level selection.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSocialLink: Admin UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting social links with dialogs and form state management.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with validation and social links, submitting messages through a mutation.
frontend/src/pages/ExperiencePage.tsx: Displays a timeline of experiences fetched from the API with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides a hero section with dynamic typing text, project/contact links, and resume download handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Shows a grid of project cards loaded from the API with skeleton placeholders during loading.
frontend/src/pages/SkillsPage.tsx: Fetches skills, groups them by category, and displays them in cards with loading states.
frontend/src/seo/routeSeo.ts: Defines SEO metadata mappings for public routes and provides a lookup helper.
frontend/src/seo/SeoHeadManager.tsx: Manages dynamic SEO tags, canonical links, and JSON‑LD based on route, with special handling for admin pages.
frontend/src/seo/structuredData.ts: Generates JSON‑LD structured data for website and person schemas and combines them.
frontend/src/utils/adminAuthErrors.ts: Normalizes backend admin authentication errors into simple user‑friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/adminRedirect.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears intended admin redirect paths via sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/motokoOption.ts: Utility to unwrap Motoko/Candid optional values into plain null or value.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, animations, typography, and container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for a Laravel + MySQL portfolio site with an admin panel. Includes requirements for authentication, SEO, media handling, and various inconsistencies to resolve.
